name: Cybervania
description:
Cybervania is a fast paced 2.5D metroid vania game prototype cobining the vibrant colours of cyberpunk with the layout and style of castlevania. the demo has a neon gothic style and is comprised of two main levels of the graveyard and the castle. This was a small project designed to experiment with using art within a 2.5D enviroment as well as to create gameplay and levels from this perspective.

DOWNLOAD COMING SOON
